author: pburba
msg: * STATUS: Nominate r30020.

author: pburba
msg: Fix issue #3133, don't contact server during WC->WC moves and copies.
* subversion/libsvn_client/copy.c
(calculate_target_mergeinfo): Doc string tweak noting that ra_session
can be NULL if we are not contacting the repos.
(propagate_mergeinfo_within_wc): Don't open an RA session!  This function
is strictly a helper for WC->WC copies and moves (the removed bit of code
dates back to when we *did* contact the server in these cases).  Also
tweak the doc string to remove mention of non-existent
with_merge_history argument.

author: stsp
msg: On the tree-conflicts branch, detect use case 5 tree conflicts.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(merge_file_deleted): Detect use case 5 tree conflicts.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(verify_lines): Rewrite for clarity. Now returns a boolean,
the error being thrown on failure is up to the caller.
(tree_conflicts_in_merged_files): Track change of return value
of verify_lines, and test for use case 5 also, now that it's
being detected.

author: stsp
msg: On the tree-conflicts branch, make a stat test pass again.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/stat_tests.py
(status_with_tree_conflicts): Trace return value change
of svntest.main.run_svn that happened on trunk in r29753.

author: ehu
msg: * notes/wc-ng-design: Add more issues and comments resulting from discussion.
